title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added documentation for viewing job condition expression logs in GitHub Actions workflows.
Reorganized GitHub Enterprise Cloud data residency features, distinguishing permanently unavailable features.
Restructured secret scanning documentation into "Secure your secrets" how-tos with new guides for leak detection and prevention.
Consolidated Dependabot ecosystem documentation into the reference section.
Updated Copilot model comparison table with a data-driven approach.
Added Article API transformers for category and discovery landing pages.

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added documentation for viewing job condition expression logs in GitHub Actions workflows.
- Reorganized GitHub Enterprise Cloud data residency features, distinguishing permanently unavailable features.
- Restructured secret scanning documentation into "Secure your secrets" how-tos with new guides for leak detection and prevention.
- Consolidated Dependabot ecosystem documentation into the reference section.
- Updated Copilot model comparison table with a data-driven approach.
- Added Article API transformers for category and discovery landing pages.
